me.taylorkelly.mywarp.command

Class ArgumentExceptionConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.intake.parametric.handler.ExceptionConverterHelper
      • me.taylorkelly.mywarp.command.ArgumentExceptionConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sk89q.intake.parametric.handler.ExceptionConverter

    public class ArgumentExceptionConverter
extends com.sk89q.intake.parametric.handler.ExceptionConverterHelper
    Converts all ArgumentParseExceptions into localized InvalidUsageExceptions.

    This class is useless when registered with a ParametricBuilder directly. Instead, another ExceptionConverter that converts ArgumentParseExceptions should be registered with the ParametricBuilder which in turn calls this class.
